DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : This study determine effectiveness preemptive administration etodolac risk intensity tooth sensitivity cause in-office bleaching use 35 % hydrogen peroxide . Materials Methods : Fifty patient select triple-blind , randomize , cross-over , placebo-controlled clinical trial . Etodolac ( 400 mg ) placebo administrate single-dose 1 hour prior bleaching procedure . The whiten treatment 35 % hydrogen peroxide carry two session 7-day interval . Tooth sensitivity assess , 24 hour procedure use analog visual verbal scale . Color alteration assess bleach guide scale 7 day session . Relative risk sensitivity calculate adjusted session ; comparison overall risk perform McNemar 's test . Data sensitivity level scale color shade subject Friedman , Wilcoxon Mann-Whitney test , respectively ( α = 0.05 ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods & Materials : This clinical trial approve Scientific Review Committee Committee Protection Human Subjects local university ( CAAE 37578714.4.0000.5546 ) . Trial design : This study randomize , triple-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial cross-over design . The patient include submit two in-office bleaching session receive placebo ( control ) etodolac prior bleaching procedure ; different treatment allocate session . A delay 1 week session ( wash-out ) establish . The study conduct clinic School Dentistry local university November 2014 July 2015 . Participants : Patients include clinical trial least 18 year old good oral health . Patients six upper anterior teeth caries , restoration , severe discoloration ( e.g. , stain cause tetracycline ) , enamel hypoplasia , gingival recession , dentin exposure , pulpitis , endodontics exclude . Participants submit previous bleaching procedure , present prior tooth sensitivity , know allergy component medication use study , pregnant breastfeeding also exclude . Only patient present six upper anterior teeth shade mismatch 2.5 M2 ( Vita Bleachguide 3D-Master scale , Vita-Zahnfabrik , Bad Sackingen , Germany ) darker include . Sample Size Calculation : The sample calculation base primary binary outcome ( sensitivity risk 24 hour procedure ) superiority trial . Power test set 80 % , consider type I error 0.05 ; risk tooth sensitivity 90 % , base prior study use similar bleaching agent , reduction around 30 % treatment expect . The calculation result fifty patient . Randomization : A randomized list computer-generated person involve intervention evaluation . The participant define block randomization process , sequence treatment ( placebo etodolac ) randomly set block use computer-generated table ( www.sealedenvelope.com ) . The sequence insert sealed envelope number 1 50 open operator moment intervention . The patient number accord sequence enrollment . Neither participant operator know group allocation determine blind protocol . Baseline evaluation : Prior bleaching procedure , teeth clean use rubber cup associate pumice water . The shade six upper anterior teeth assess baseline use bleach guide scale . The color analysis carry two previously calibrate evaluator . The two evaluator present superior color matching competency accord ISO ( International Organization Standardization ) 28642:2011 . The shade ' tab select converted score range 1 ( whiter shade - 0M1 ) 15 ( darker shade - 5M3 ) . Considering possible effect dental anxiety sensitivity report patient , Corah 's Dental Anxiety Scale use determine level anxiety patient related procedure [ 26 ] . Each answer survey instrument score scale 1 5 ( four question ) ; sum score use determine level anxiety : low low 12 , moderate 12 14 , high high 14 . Intervention : One-hour prior bleaching session , patient receive capsule contain 400 mg NAISE etodolac 400mg placebo ( inert content ) , accord randomization , capsule present appearance . The capsule similar presentation manufacture person involve intervention evaluation place two bottle identify letter accord treatment . Neither operator responsible intervention evaluation patient know content capsule . A light-cured resin dam apply ( Top Dam , FGM , Joinville , SC , Brazil ) gingival tissue correspond teeth bleach . A 35 % hydrogen peroxide base bleaching agent ( Whiteness HP Blue , FGM , Joinville , SC , Brazil ) mix apply vestibular surface teeth , remain 40 minute . After time , bleach agent remove . A second session beas carry 1 week follow procedure . At time , patient receive single-dose capsule contain etodolac placebo ( different one receive first session ) 1 hour procedure . Evaluations : The tooth sensitivity report patient assess use visual analog scale ( VAS ) verbal rating scale ( VRS ) . The VAS consist scale 10 cm length range green ( absence pain ) red ( unsupportable pain ) . The patient set level sensitivity point color correspond level , distance point green border record . For VRS , patient report level sensitivity base score : 0 = none , 1 = light , 2 = moderate , 3 = considerable 4 = severe . The tooth sensitivity assess bleaching , immediately bleach agent removal 24 hour . For last assessment , VRS use . One week session tooth color evaluate use procedure describe previously . Statistical Analysis : The demographic data patient analyzed determine age , gender , anxiety level allocation sequence . Comparisons allocation sequence perform Mann-Whitney test ( age ) Fisher 's exact ( gender ) chi-square ( anxiety level ) test . Based presence tooth sensitivity ( score different 0 VRS ) , absolute risk , odds ratio relative risk calculate regard treatment moment evaluation/session bleaching , well confidence interval ( 95 % ) . For moment , difference presence/absence ratio analyze Fisher 's exact test . For overall risk relate treatment , odds ratio adjust independent variable `` session bleaching '' use Mantel-Haenszel statistic . The homogeneity odds ratio analyze Breslow-Day Tarone 's test . Following , odds ratio estimate converted relative risk overall presence/absence ratio analyze McNemar 's test , consider study design ( cross-over ) . For VRS , data score observe time evaluation/session bleach submit Mann-Whitney rank sum test . Despite measurement tooth sensitivity use VAS give continuous outcome , data assess scale show normal distribution ( Shapiro-Wilk 's test ) . Thus , data VAS also analyze Mann-Whitney rank sum test , one test per time evaluation carry . For color evaluation , comparison sequence treatment perform use Mann-Whitney rank sum test . The Friedman test follow Dunn 's post hoc test use analyze difference moment evaluation sequence treatment . All statistical analysis perform adjust initial significance level ( α = 0.05 ) Bonferroni correction .
